message.content:
{"id": "10022", 
"title": "Incorrect \"Build\" popup action enablement",
"description": "When in the Java perspective, the \"Build\" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, even if the user has selected the option \"Perform build automatically on resource modification\" in the Preferences > Workbench settings. This behavior is incorrect.",
"OB": "The \"Build\" menu option should not appear in the Java popup menus when the option \"Perform build automatically on resource modification\" is selected in the Preferences > Workbench settings.",
"EB": "There is no need for the \"Build\" menu option to be manually enabled if the build is already performed automatically.",
"SR": "Update the Java perspective context-sensitive popup menu to correctly enable/disable the \"Build\" action based on the option selected in Preferences > Workbench settings."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '10022', 'title': 'Bug 10022Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement', 'description': 'Bug 10022Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement ', 'OB': 'If "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspectiveis always enabled. Even if the user goes to PreferencesWorkbench andselects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" the build menuoption still appears in the Java popup menus.I believe this is incorrect. ', 'EB': 'No need for a manual build if the build is alreadydone, automatically.Mazen Faraj. ', 'SR': ''}
